thread.title: See Pics! Freida Pinto Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi!
thread.title_full: See Pics! Freida Pinto Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi!

title: See Pics! Freida Pinto Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi!
text:
Â» See Pics! Freida Pinto Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi! See Pics! Freida Pinto Meets His Holiness Dalai Lama In Delhi! See here! Pictures of Freida Pinto with His Holiness Dalai Lama in Delhi on February 3-4 at a private teaching called 'On Virtue & Vice'.  42   
The Slumdog Millionaire star Freida Pinto was present at the 'On Virtue & Vice' event held by the Buddhist leader His Holiness Dalai Lama in Delhi on February 3-4 and the actress accompanied Lisa Ray to the event. The private two day teaching was about universal values, compassion, technology and science.Freida, posted pictures on her social media handle meeting Dalia Lama and captioned it as, "If you catch me smiling like crazy over the next few days, then you know this man is the reason behind it!"Check out the pictures below! Also, Freida Pinto revealed that the two day private teaching was filled with boundless love and positivity. She captioned an image as, "Surrounded by boundless love and positivity in the presence of His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama. Thank you so much team @vidyaloke for letting us have a wonderful 2 days of teachings with the man himself!"
